text: The portico at the front of the main hall of the temple was twenty cubits 6:3 20 cubits is approximately 30 feet or 9.1 meters; also in verses 16 and 20. long, extending across the width of the temple and projecting out ten cubits 6:3 10 cubits is approximately 15 feet or 4.6 meters; also in verses 23â€“26. in front of the temple.
